entries.journal_entry_description: Chrilooc wants you to speak with an associate of his named Johnson Smith.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Chrilooc wants you to speak with an associate of his in the Hunting Grounds. Johnson Smith could use your help in his work, but also might have information about Brody Johnson.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Find Johnson Smith in the Hunting Grounds
